description: Leader of the 88 kiyakou of the four kingdoms, his father is the head of the 808 (Shikoku Hachijuukakki Yakou) Tanuki. He is able to inspire his men through his charisma but sees them as disposable, he sees through Rikuo`s power and seeks to return the world to darkness, even inviting Rikuo to join his group behind him in order to do so. He gained his power by killing his allies and brothers using the Maou`s Hammer, the very sword that defeated his clan. He was defeated by Rikuo and spared on his father`s wishes on the condition he never leave Shikoku and he holds a memorial for those he killed.
name: Inugamigyoubu Tamazuki
